name: Hurt
description: Hurt is an ambitious indie title that puts you in the shoes of Vic Viper, an over the top action hero. When a army of parasitic aliens known as "The Purge" invade the planet, Vic comes out of retirement to blow away these alien parasitic pests on his way to escape planet earth. This throwback to '80s action movies with modern FPS intensity, high quality neon-cool graphics, and a kick-butt soundtrack, Hurt takes players to the next level of sci-fi horror action.
